results.title: The effects of Rosmarinus officinalis L. essential oil and its nanoemulsion on dyslipidemic Wistar rats.
results.text_hl: Similar results were observed on the positive control treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@. @DISEASE_Dyslipidemias @DISEASE_MESH:D050171 @@@Dyslipidemia@@@ induced with coconut saturated-fat (CSF) caused @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal fat@@@ gain, @DISEASE_Hypercholesterolemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006937 @@@hypercholesterolemia@@@, @DISEASE_Hypertriglyceridemia @DISEASE_MESH:D015228 @@@hypertriglyceridemia@@@, increased LDL levels, and @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherogenesis@@@ in the aorta.

citations.NLM: Santos Rodrigues AP, Faria E Souza BS, Alves Barros AS, de Oliveira Carvalho H, Lobato Duarte J, Leticia Elizandra Boettger M, Barbosa R, Maciel Ferreira A, Maciel Ferreira I, Fernandes CP, Cesar Matias Pereira A, Tavares Carvalho JC. The effects of Rosmarinus officinalis L. essential oil and its nanoemulsion on dyslipidemic Wistar rats. J Appl Biomed. 2020 Dec;18(4):126-135. PMID: 34907765

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ protects against T cell @DISEASE_Immune_System_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D007154 @@@immune dysfunction@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal sepsis@@@.

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ antagonizes @GENE_CD40LG @GENE_21947 @@@CD40L@@@ secretion, CXC chemokine formation, and pulmonary infiltration of neutrophils in @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal sepsis@@@.

results.title: Heart and systemic effects of statin pretreatment in a rat model of abdominal sepsis. Assessment by Tc99m-sestamibi biodistribition.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: To evaluate the heart and the @CHEMICAL_Technetium_Tc_99m_Sestamibi @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017256 @@@Tc-99m-sestamibi@@@ biodistribution after statin pretreatment in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal sepsis@@@. METHODS: Twenty-four Wistar @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ were randomly distributed into four groups (n=6 per group): 1) @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment, 2) @DISEASE_Sepsis @DISEASE_MESH:D018805 @@@sepsis@@@ with vehicle, 3) sham control with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and 4) sham control with vehicle. 24 hours after cecal ligation and puncture @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ received 1.0MBq of @CHEMICAL_Technetium_Tc_99m_Sestamibi @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017256 @@@Tc-99m-sestamibi@@@ i.v. 30min after, animals were euthanized for ex-vivo tissue counting and myocardium histological analysis.

citations.NLM: Macedo R, Javadi SM, Higuchi T, Carvalho MD, Medeiros Vde F, Azevedo ÍM, Lima FP, Medeiros AC. Heart and systemic effects of statin pretreatment in a rat model of abdominal sepsis. Assessment by Tc99m-sestamibi biodistribition. Acta Cir Bras. 2015 Jun;30(6):388-93. PMID: 26108026
citations.BibTeX: @article{26108026, title={Heart and systemic effects of statin pretreatment in a rat model of abdominal sepsis. Assessment by Tc99m-sestamibi biodistribition.}, author={Macedo R and Javadi SM and Higuchi T and Carvalho MD and Medeiros Vde F and Azevedo ÍM and Lima FP and Medeiros AC}, journal={Acta Cir Bras}, volume={30}, number={6}, pages={388-93}}

results.title: Effects of cococonut water and simvastatin in the treatment of sepsis and hemorrhagic shock in rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS:: Resuscitation with coconut water with @CHEMICAL_Sodium_Chloride @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012965 @@@Nacl@@@ 3%+@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ had a significant beneficial effect on downregulating cytokines and decreasing @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@lung injury@@@ in a @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ model of @<m>DISEASE_Abdominal_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000007 @@@abdominal sepsis@@@ and @DISEASE_Shock_Hemorrhagic @DISEASE_MESH:D012771 @@@hemorrhagic shock@@@.

citations.NLM: Medeiros VF, Azevedo ÍM, Carvalho MD, Egito ES, Medeiros AC. Effects of cococonut water and simvastatin in the treatment of sepsis and hemorrhagic shock in rats. Acta Cir Bras. 2016 Dec;31(12):826-833. PMID: 28076507
